channel.title: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Science on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Science on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oscars Submissions Site Opens With New Producer Sign-Off Requirement
item.description: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences has opened its Oscars submissions portal, offering producers and studios the opportunity to purchase and upload streaming assets directly to the Academy
